alert.note: Alert for Salt Lake; Summit; Utah; Wasatch (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 5:30PM MDT until July 03 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Wasatch County in northern Utah... Salt Lake County in northern Utah... Western Summit County in northern Utah... Central Utah County in northern Utah... * Until 600 PM MDT * At 530 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near American Fork, or 13 miles northwest of Provo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Provo, Sandy, Murray, Payson, West Jordan, Orem, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Spanish Fork, Pleasant Grove, Cottonwood Heights, Springville, Midvale, Holladay and American Fork. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 249 and 307. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 123 and 139. US Route 6 between mile markers 174 and 182. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
